title: Democratic debate - live updates: Protesters interrupt Biden as candidates give their closing statements
text:
The leading 10 candidates for the Democrat's presidential nomination will take to the debating stage for the first time, bringing heavyweights in the field Elizabeth Warren, Joe Biden, and Bernie Sanders all onto the same stage for the first time.

Starting at 8pm EST (1am UK), the debate will take place in Houston, Texas, and only be for one night, unlike the previous showdowns.

Tonight's candidates are: Mr Biden, Ms Warren, Mr Sanders Cory Booker, Pete Buttigieg, Julian Castro, Kamala Harris, Amy Klobuchar, Beto O'Rourke, and Andrew Yang.

Follow live updates

Please allow a moment for our liveblog to load
